body:
Hi all,



My 2 cents here, I am experimenting with flux please see: [https://flux.io/](https://flux.io/)

to move Revit models into Rhino for analysis, I'm not there yet but I will post my work flow once I get there (Hopefully next few weeks). 



That being said HB in Dyanmo would be wonderful but at this stage I feel Dyanmo is just so clunky it would be hard for things to ever be as smooth as Grasshopper
